title: Create new components (start, checkin, card-flow)
description:
## Objective

Create the three new/heavily-modified components for FO-12: the Start motivational screen, the parameterized Check-in screen, and the phase-aware Affirmation Card Flow.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Sections: "Start Screen (Step 6)", "Check-in 1 (Step 8)", "Check-in 2 (Step 10)", "Selection Phase 1-3"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-12/components/step-start.tsx — NEW: motivational screen before first affirmations
- app/fo-12/components/step-checkin.tsx — NEW: parameterized for check-in 1 and 2
- app/fo-12/components/affirmation-card-flow.tsx — HEAVILY MODIFIED from FO-11

## Implementation

1. **step-start.tsx:** New static component
   - Props: onContinue callback, name (string)
   - Headline: "Based on what you've shared, 10 affirmations are ready for you."
   - Subheading: "Choose the ones that feel right for you — the ones you can actually say to yourself."
   - Body: "Your feedback helps us refine your next set. Now, let's create affirmations that truly support you."
   - Button: "Let's Begin"
   - Tone: calm, affirming, personal

2. **step-checkin.tsx:** Parameterized check-in component
   - Props: phase (1 | 2), onContinue callback, isLoading boolean
   - Phase 1 content: see spec "Check-in 1" section
   - Phase 2 content: see spec "Check-in 2" section
   - Button: "Continue"
   - When isLoading is true, show loading/thinking screen instead of button
   - Tone: calm, affirming, supportive (not overly enthusiastic)

3. **affirmation-card-flow.tsx:** Major changes from FO-11
   - Props: affirmations (string[]), onComplete callback, totalLovedSoFar (number), target (number, default 30), onRequestMore callback (optional, for phase 3 pool exhaustion)
   - Replace local "{N}/{total}" counter with global "{totalLovedSoFar + lovedInThisBatch} of {target} selected" counter
   - The progress bar should reflect global progress (totalLovedSoFar / target)
   - In phase 3 continuous mode: if we run out of cards before reaching target and onRequestMore is provided, call onRequestMore instead of onComplete
   - Keep the existing AffirmationCard component and AnimatePresence pattern

## Tests

Verify: All 3 files created with correct content.

Do NOT close until all files are created.
acceptance_criteria: All 3 new component files exist in app/fo-12/components/
closed_reason: Created 3 new components: step-start (static motivational screen with calm/affirming copy, 'Let\'s Begin' button), step-checkin (parameterized for phase 1 and 2 with distinct content, loading/thinking state), affirmation-card-flow (global 'X of 30 selected' counter, progress bar reflecting totalLovedSoFar/target, onRequestMore for phase 3 pool exhaustion). All 15 FO-12 components now exist and pass TypeScript compilation.
